description: Adaptive Layout definition for the Autocomplete component.

allowWrite.description: Specifies whether the Autocomplete component can be changed.
allowWrite.label: Allow Write

disabled.description: Specifies whether the Autocomplete component is disabled.
disabled.label: Disabled

isLoading.description: Specifies whether the Autocomplete component is currently loading.
isLoading.label: Is Loading

label.description: The label for the Autocomplete component.
label.label: Label

options.description: The available options for the Autocomplete component.
options.label: Options

placeholder.description: Specifies the placeholder text displayed when no value is present.
placeholder.label: Placeholder

required.description: Specifies whether this Autocomplete component is required.
required.label: Required

value.description: The option value for the Autocomplete component.
value.label: Value
